base.title: COMPANY DETAILS
base.description:
# Company Details: 

In this section, we will ask you for **legal details** about your company, including:

- Official company name
- Trade name
- VAT/Tax ID
- Address and location details

Please ensure that the information you provide matches your official business records.

formMainData.name: companyName
formMainData.label: Company name
formMainData.additionalInfo: This is the "legal name" of your company (not the trade name) or your name if you are self-employed, in our case it would be: ZIP ONLINE SERVICES SL.

formMainData.name: tradeName
formMainData.label: Trade name
formMainData.additionalInfo: This is the "commercial name" of your company, in our case it would be: ZIPTRANSFERS.

formMainData.name: vat
formMainData.label: VAT
formMainData.additionalInfo: This is the legal identification number of your company (value-added tax). It is known in different ways depending on the country: VAT, IVA, or NIF/CIF.

formGridData.name: zipCode
formGridData.label: Zip code
formGridData.additionalInfo: Also known as Postal Code in some countries.

formGridData.name: country
formGridData.label: Country
formGridData.additionalInfo: This is the country where your company is registered.

formGridData.name: province
formGridData.label: Province
formGridData.additionalInfo: This is the province or state where your company is registered.

base.title: CONTACT PERSON
base.description: In this section, we will ask you for contact information.

formMainData.name: firstName
formMainData.label: First name
formMainData.additionalInfo: This is the first name of the representative of your company.

formMainData.name: lastName
formMainData.label: Last name
formMainData.additionalInfo: This is the last name of the representative of your company.

formMainData.name: position
formMainData.label: Role in company
formMainData.additionalInfo: This is the position of the representative of your company.

decisionData.name: yesnoContact
decisionData.label: Do you have a specific phone number or email address for direct communications?

dependents.name: phone
dependents.label: Phone number
dependents.additionalInfo: This is the phone number of the representative of your company.

dependents.name: email
dependents.label: Email address
dependents.additionalInfo: This is the email address of the representative of your company.

base.title: COMMUNICATION DETAILS
base.description: In this section, we ask for phone numbers and emails for each type of communication.

formMainData.name: emergencyPhone
formMainData.label: Emergency phone number (24h)
formMainData.additionalInfo: This is the phone number of the representative of your company.

formMainData.name: reservationEmail
formMainData.label: Email for reservations
formMainData.additionalInfo: This is the email address of the representative of your company.

formGridData.name: lenguages
formGridData.label: Lenguages
formGridData.additionalInfo: Tese are the lenguages of the company.

formGridData.name: website
formGridData.label: Website
formGridData.additionalInfo: This is the website of the company.

decisionData.name: whatsappAvailable
decisionData.label: Do you have WhatsApp available for daily communications?
